flawed_nl_solution:
Since the word score after being tripled was 30 points, then the word score before tripling was 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 points.
If before the word score was tripled, the first and third letters were each valued at one point apiece, then the value of the middle letter was 10-1-1=<<10-1-1=7>>7 points.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
